item.title: Smokey Bones
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
The best thing about Smokey Bones, well other than the frequent $10 off a $20 purchase coupons found in the Sunday newspaper and their decent burgers, is their homemade donuts. The post Smokey Bones appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
The best thing about Smokey Bones, well other than the frequent $10 off a $20 purchase coupons found in the Sunday newspaper and their decent burgers, is their homemade donuts. The simple fried dessert covered in cinnamon and sugar, served with chocolate and a strawberry cream sauce is the perfect way to end a decent meal. And besides, who can go wrong with homemade donuts?

The post Smokey Bones appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.

item.title: Smokey Bones

I was surprised by their “build your own burger” menu that would ensure that whatever […]

The post Smokey Bones appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
Last night I didn’t feel like cooking anything and nothing sounded appetizing, then my husband and I decides to check out Smokey Bones (yeah, I know it’s a chain but we had a coupon and I’ve never tried it before).

I was surprised by their “build your own burger” menu that would ensure that whatever I wanted I could get, which meant mushrooms, mushrooms, and more mushrooms! Their turkey patty was well seasoned and delicious and added great flavor. The only thing that would have made the burger better would have been more sloppy sauces to drench every part of the bun.

In the picture you will see to the right of the burger my favorite side dish: French fries. I very easily could have eaten nothing but fries and been completely happy last night. Thick and salty and delicious.

The post Smokey Bones appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
